Tesorio has created a platform to help the Fortune 5,000,000 run as if they had a Fortune 500 finance team. We plug into a company’s data sources about cash in/out and our job is to leverage data science to surface the most impactful actions they can take to optimize their cash flow—and let them implement those actions with the click of a button.We’re looking for a talented leader for our small but mighty data team to help us ideate, design, and implement impactful data-driven features and reinvent how complex financial transactions can be simplified to the click of a button.We are developing machine learning algorithms to understand business cash needs, predictive algorithms to forecast future cash flow, and a sleek UI/UX to make our products enjoyable to work with. You’ll be joining an early-stage company with a small, tight-knit team, backed by top-tier VCs (including First Round, Floodgate, Fuel and Y Combinator). You’ll work closely with the entire engineering team and the co-founders. Learn more at tesorio.com.About You[Modeling / ML] Excited by solving hard technical statistical modeling and machine learning problems. Constantly stretching your toolbox of capabilities. Specific experience or knowledge in forecasting a big plus[Strategy] Adept at partnering with product and engineering leadership to establish a clear strategy for data driven products and features[Product Experience] Enjoy building data products that elegantly leverage math/stats/machine learning to delight customers[Hands on] Experience (preferably in AWS) deploying large-scale, production machine learning systems. Proficient with production code delivery in our current stack, which includes Astronomer/Airflow, S3, Snowflake, DBT, python, sci-kit learn, and Metabase[Startup mindset] Enjoys working on challenges in a fast-paced startup environment and delivering value to customers and to our businessIdeal CandidateB.S./M.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience preferred8+ years of work experience, including 2+ as a manager of DS/ML in a strategic roleExcited to lead a small but highly impactful and strategic teamPlayer-coach who can make an impact either as a hands-on contributor or as a manager for their teamExpert at translating strategy and ideas into concrete deliverables to move the needle for the businessStrong communications skillsSolid understanding of forecasting with time series / machine learning / deep learning techniques and tabular dataExciting Projects[Visualization] Help our users get deeper understanding of their customers based on their payment profiles[Predictive] Build large scale models with top banking partners to enable their customers to forecast and understand their cash flow[Visualization] Discover trends in how companies are growing and understand their financial situation[Language models] Leverage GPT language models to improve efficiency for our customers (e.g by performing sentiment analysis and suggesting email responses)[Matching/Recommendation] Enable customers to automatically match payment transactions from various data sources
